location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Plate II. Plate showing Badges of Rank of Non-Commissioned Officers. Field Service Order.’

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions: 80 x 150 mm, on sheet 315 x 187 mm.Materials: Printed in colour on paper.

mods.abstract: Showing: cuff badges for Tabin Awwaland Sirjougeh; shoulder badges for Wakil Chap(infantry); Wakil Rast(cavalry); Wakil Bashi(artillery); and Moin Naib(transport). A note states that ‘the colour of the shoulder strap varies with the branch of the service.’

name.namePart: Simla Drawing Office, General Staff, India
